price: Njeriu thotë: “Vallë, pasi të vdes, a do të ringjallem përsëri?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوۡفَ أُخۡرَجُ حَيًّا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlu al-insānu a-idhā mā mittu lasawfa ukh'raju ḥayyan
